queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("ifInDiscards"),1s) * 8  AS "Ingress Discarded Packet Rate", (non_negative_derivative(last("ifInErrors"),1s)) * 8 AS "Ingress Errored Packet Rate", non_negative_derivative(last("ifInUnknownProtos"),1s) * 8  AS "Ingress Unknown Protocols Packet Rate" FROM "snmp"."autogen"."IF-MIB::ifEntry" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=':NAS:' AND "ifDescr"=':Interface:' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("ifInDiscards"),1s) * 8  AS "Ingress Discarded Packet Rate", (non_negative_derivative(last("ifInErrors"),1s)) * 8 AS "Ingress Errored Packet Rate", non_negative_derivative(last("ifInUnknownProtos"),1s) * 8  AS "Ingress Unknown Protocols Packet Rate" FROM "snmp"."autogen"."IF-MIB::ifEntry" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=':NAS:' AND "ifDescr"=':Interface:' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("ifOutDiscards"),1s) * -8  AS "Egress Discarded Packet Rate", (non_negative_derivative(last("ifOutErrors"),1s)) * -8 AS "Egress Errored Packet Rate" FROM "snmp"."autogen"."IF-MIB::ifEntry" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=':NAS:' AND "ifDescr"=':Interface:' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

query.influxql: SHOW TAG VALUES ON "snmp" WITH KEY="host" WHERE "agent_type"='lenovo_emc'
SHOW TAG VALUES ON "snmp" FROM "IF-MIB::ifEntry" WITH KEY="ifDescr" WHERE "host"=':NAS:'
